document.full_text: there is no evidence of a significant spread of radiation from japan's crippled nuclear plants, the world health organization said on wednesday, calling on people to stay calm and not spread rumors.
document.title: who: no significant global spread of japan radiation
lines_and_colors: there is no evidence of a significant spread of radiation from japan's crippled nuclear plants, the world health organization said on wednesday, calling on people to stay calm and not spread rumors.
